title: The Game Awards start soon. Here’s what you need to know.
description: Follow live coverage of the 2022 Game Awards for the biggest announcements, winners and highlights from the video game industry's premier awards ceremony.

title: What does the FTC’s lawsuit mean for the Microsoft Activision deal?
description: Breaking down the top questions following the FTC's announcement it would sue to halt Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard.

title: FTC sues to block Microsoft’s acquisition of game giant Activision
description: The lawsuit represents the FTC’s most significant effort to rein in consolidation in the tech industry since prominent tech critic Lina Khan became the commission’s chair.

title: ‘Diablo IV’ developers work long hours, bracing for impending release
description: "Diablo IV" is slated for a June 6, 2023 release. Mismanagement and disturbing script changes have contributed to delays, workers say.

title: AI selfies — and their critics — are taking the internet by storm
description: Seeing AI selfies everywhere? Here's how to generate your own — and what to know about the app Lensa before you download.

title: Russian disinformation is demonizing Ukrainian refugees
description: As Russian forces shell Ukrainian cities, pro-Kremlin propagandists have homed in on a new topic: turning Europeans against Ukrainian refugees.
